title: Student-led nursing simulation education design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Simulation-based education set in elderly care facilities with limited practical environments. Students perform leading roles in recreated clinical settings, developing practical skills through collaboration with peers and faculty

learning_goals: Students can demonstrate technical and non-technical competencies required for elderly patient care in a simulation environment with over 80% accuracy.
Students improve their clinical reasoning process through peer feedback in three or more practice sessions.
Students enhance their attitudes and knowledge levels toward elderly care by over 20% through pre-post assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
